name: Deluxe Ocean View Room
description: Experience ultimate relaxation and luxury in our Deluxe Ocean View Room. This spacious room features a king-size bed, a private balcony with stunning ocean views, and a modern bathroom with a jacuzzi. Whether you're seeking a romantic getaway or a serene retreat, this room offers everything you need for a memorable stay.

name: Luxury Suite
description: Indulge in the epitome of opulence with our spacious Luxury Suite. This suite features a separate living area, a king-size bed, and large windows offering panoramic city views. The marble bathroom boasts a deep soaking tub and a walk-in shower. Enjoy the perfect blend of comfort and elegance during your stay.

name: Family Villa
description: Our Family Villa is the ideal choice for families or groups. This spacious accommodation offers two bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, a private pool, and a lush garden. Relax on your private terrace and savor quality time with your loved ones in this tranquil oasis.

name: Presidential Suite
description: Experience luxury at its finest in our Presidential Suite. This expansive suite boasts a grand bedroom, a separate living and dining area, a private jacuzzi, and breathtaking mountain vistas. Our exclusive suite offers the utmost in privacy, comfort, and personalized service.

name: Standard Room
description: Our comfortable Standard Room is perfect for those seeking a cozy and affordable stay. It features a queen-size bed, a compact work area, and all the essential amenities for a pleasant visit. Enjoy a peaceful night's sleep and access to all the hotel's facilities.

name: Executive Suite
description: Elevate your stay in our Executive Suite, offering a spacious bedroom, a separate living room, and a private terrace with garden views. Enjoy a blend of elegance and comfort in a serene environment. This suite is perfect for business travelers or those seeking a little extra space.
